hero.name: Vivek Gupta
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.tagline: Building scalable systems with Java, Python, React & AI where innovation meets intelligent automation

about.story:
As a Full-Stack Engineer with AI expertise, I bridge the gap between traditional software development and intelligent automation. My journey spans 6+ years architecting enterprise solutions that serve millions of users at companies like Amazon, where I've built ML-powered recommendation engines and scalable backend systems.

What sets me apart is my ability to seamlessly integrate cutting-edge AI technologies into production environments. From developing data science platforms at Rochester Institute of Technology to optimizing automation frameworks at BNP Paribas, I've consistently delivered solutions that combine robust engineering principles with innovative AI capabilities.

Currently, I'm passionate about leveraging Large Language Models and AI tools like Kiro and Claude to transform software development workflows. I believe the future lies in human-AI collaboration, where intelligent systems amplify our creativity and solve complex problems at unprecedented scale.

experience.description: Built end-to-end scalable features with AWS services, improved recommendation algorithms for series use cases
Developed core features for competitive mobile gaming platform's developer console including analytics dashboards, learning center, and RBAC systems
Built web-based data science learning platform enabling non-technical users to perform data mining tasks without coding
Built ETL pipelines and analytics dashboards for enterprise bug tracking systems
Optimized automation testing frameworks and developed reusable API libraries

projects.title: BNGE-MOVIES
projects.description: A React and Redux app deployed on AWS using Terraform, integrated with CircleCI for CI/CD tasks and dockerized. Features Netflix-like movie browsing interface.

projects.title: CRWN-CLOTHING
projects.description: Full-stack clothing e-commerce web application with add to cart, checkout features, Firebase authentication, and Stripe payment gateway.

projects.title: COVID-19 PREDICTION
projects.description: Comprehensive data analysis project merging 3 data sources, performing EDA and predicting affected cases using ARIMA and decision tree ML algorithms.

projects.title: DATA VISUALIZATION
projects.description: Exploratory Data Analysis and predictions on multiple datasets including bike purchases, HR analysis, and attrition prediction.

projects.title: SENTIMENT ANALYSIS
projects.description: Flask web application that retrieves product reviews based on user search and performs sentiment analysis using KNN machine learning algorithm.

certifications.title: Complete React Developer Course
certifications.description: Comprehensive React 18 certification covering enterprise-level application development, Redux/Context API, GraphQL, Firebase integration, Progressive Web Apps, and modern JavaScript ES6+

certifications.title: React with CircleCI, AWS & Docker Course
certifications.description: Advanced DevOps certification covering CI/CD pipelines, AWS services with Terraform, Docker containerization, S3/CloudFront deployment, Slack integration, and automated staging/production environments
